abstract: Sanofi-Aventis has agreed to buy the private U.S. cancer specialist BiPar Sciences for up to $500 million, in the latest bolt-on acquisition by the French drugmaker.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis has agreed to buy the private U.S. cancer specialist BiPar Sciences for up to $500 million, in the latest bolt-on acquisition by the French drugmaker.

headline.main: Sanofi Buys U.S. Cancer Firm for Up to $500 Million
